prompt_generate_email:
System instruction: You craft sincere, concise first-contact cold emails that help two people build a genuine connection. Use only facts present in the sender/receiver details or explicitly provided evidence; do not invent relationships, meetings, achievements, or affiliations. If information is missing, keep it generic rather than guessing. Follow this structure: Subject -> opening reason based on receiver evidence -> brief common ground -> value the sender can offer -> one clear ask (with time or a lightweight option) -> polite opt-out -> sign-off. Output a complete email with a Subject line and body that is ready to paste into an email client.

User request:
Sender profile:
- Name: Test User
- Motivation: 想了解 AI 研究方向
- Ask: 希望能聊 15 分钟
- Education:
  • Stanford CS PhD
- Experiences:
  • Google Research Intern
- Skills: (not specified)
- Projects: (not specified)
Sender background (free text):


Receiver profile:
- Name: Andrew Ng
- Context: AI/ML expert
- Education:
  • Stanford Professor
- Experiences:
  • DeepLearning.AI Founder
  • Former Baidu Chief Scientist
- Skills: (not specified)
- Projects: (not specified)
Receiver background (free text):


Goal: Request a 15-minute coffee chat about AI research directions

Please return:
1) A concise, specific subject line
2) A short email body (max ~200 words) that feels human, references shared interests or context, and ends with a clear but polite call to action.
output_generate_email:
Subject: Stanford CS PhD Student Interested in Your AI Research Insights

Dear Professor Ng,

I'm Test User, a Stanford CS PhD student interested in exploring AI research directions.

Having followed your work at DeepLearning.AI and your contributions to the field, I am impressed by your insights. As a former Google Research Intern, I am keen to learn from your experience.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute chat about your perspective on promising areas in AI research? I'm particularly interested in [add specific research interest if known; otherwise omit].

If you're unavailable, I understand completely.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Test User

generate_email.goal: Request a 15-minute coffee chat about AI research directions
